actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement persistence of API latency and error metrics to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will ensure metrics are not lost on server restart and can be aggregated across instances.
implementation_steps: Add Redis client initialization in src/config/redis.js if not present.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to write rolling window metrics to Redis after each run.
Modify metrics middleware to read/write rolling window data from/to Redis instead of in-memory only.
Test with local Redis instance to verify durability and multi-instance aggregation.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and commit a migration plan for converting backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) to TypeScript. This should include a prioritized list, migration guidelines, and initial type definitions.
implementation_steps: Create MIGRATION_PLAN.md outlining the migration order and rationale.
List modules by change frequency and technical risk.
Add example tsconfig.json and initial type definitions for one module.
Commit plan and sample conversion for review.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Provider Quick-Switch to EnhancedChatInterface.jsx
actionable_tasks.description: Enable users to quickly switch LLM providers in the chat interface using the useLLM() hook and display the current provider as a chip/badge.
implementation_steps: Import and use the useLLM() hook in EnhancedChatInterface.jsx.
Add a dropdown or button group for provider selection.
Display the current provider as a chip/badge in the chat UI.
Test provider switching and UI updates.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Mood Settings Radar/Sparkline to EnhancedMusicDiscovery.jsx
actionable_tasks.description: Implement a client-only radar or sparkline chart to visualize moodSettings values in the music discovery interface.
implementation_steps: Select a lightweight charting library (e.g., Chart.js, Recharts) if not already present.
Add a radar or sparkline chart component to display moodSettings.
Bind chart data to current moodSettings state.
Test with mock data for visual correctness.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on integration and basic security validation.
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write integration tests for endpoint responses, error handling, and security edge cases.
Run tests and ensure coverage is reported.
Document any uncovered areas for future work.
